parameters.name: Support Team Size
parameters.description: Number of dedicated support staff

parameters.name: Skill Coverage
parameters.description: Coverage of required skills in support team

parameters.name: 24/7 Coverage
parameters.description: Availability of round-the-clock support

parameters.name: Vendor SLA
parameters.description: Service level agreements with vendors

parameters.name: Support Hours
parameters.description: Vendor support availability hours

parameters.name: Response Time
parameters.description: Guaranteed vendor response time for critical issues

data.name: Support Metrics
data.description: Measurement and tracking of support effectiveness

parameters.name: MTTR
parameters.description: Mean Time To Resolve critical incidents

parameters.name: First Contact Resolution
parameters.description: Percentage of issues resolved on first contact

parameters.name: Ticket Backlog
parameters.description: Average number of open support tickets

parameters.name: Component Redundancy
parameters.description: Redundancy of critical hardware components

parameters.name: Failover Testing
parameters.description: Frequency of failover testing

parameters.name: Geographic Redundancy
parameters.description: Availability in multiple geographic locations

data.name: Inventory Management
data.description: Management of spare parts and equipment

parameters.name: Spare Parts Inventory
parameters.description: Availability of critical spare parts

parameters.name: Inventory Tracking
parameters.description: System for tracking inventory and usage

parameters.name: Refresh Cycle
parameters.description: Regular refresh cycle for equipment

parameters.name: Alert Coverage
parameters.description: Percentage of systems with alert monitoring

parameters.name: Alert Channels
parameters.description: Number of different alert notification channels

parameters.name: Alert Response Time
parameters.description: Average time to respond to critical alerts

parameters.name: Monitoring Coverage
parameters.description: Percentage of systems with active monitoring

parameters.name: Monitoring Depth
parameters.description: Depth of monitoring beyond basic up/down

parameters.name: Monitoring Review
parameters.description: Frequency of monitoring system review

parameters.name: Maintenance Schedule
parameters.description: Existence of regular maintenance schedule

parameters.name: Maintenance Compliance
parameters.description: Compliance with scheduled maintenance

parameters.name: Patch Management
parameters.description: Timeliness of security and functional patches

parameters.name: DR Testing Frequency
parameters.description: How often DR testing is performed

parameters.name: Testing Scope
parameters.description: Scope of systems included in DR testing

parameters.name: Test Documentation
parameters.description: Quality of test plans and results documentation

data.title: Single Point of Failure in Core Network
Outdated UPS Batteries
data.description: UPS batteries are past their recommended replacement date

data.title: Database Backup Validation
data.description: Lack of regular validation testing of database backups

data.title: DR Plan Documentation Outdated
data.description: DR plan documentation has not been updated in 18 months

data.title: Meeting Room AV Systems Unreliable
data.description: Video conferencing systems failing during important meetings

data.title: WiFi Dead Zones on 3rd Floor
data.description: No wireless coverage in northeast corner

data.title: Email Delivery Delays
data.description: Emails taking up to 30 minutes to deliver internally

data.name: Recovery Time Objective (RTO)
data.description: Maximum allowable time to restore service after disaster

parameters.notes: Highest criticality due to financial impact
Required for all other systems to function

data.name: Recovery Point Objective (RPO)
data.description: Maximum acceptable data loss in time

parameters.notes: Email data is important but not transactional
Customer data is synced from other systems
Zero data loss acceptable for banking
Voice logs retained but not critical
Financial transactions must not be lost

data.name: Maximum Tolerable Downtime (MTD)
data.description: Maximum time system can be down before severe business impact

parameters.notes: Sales can operate offline for limited time
HR functions can be manual temporarily

data.name: Work Recovery Time (WRT)
data.description: Time needed for verification and testing after recovery

parameters.notes: Data validation important for customer records

data.name: Maximum Tolerable Period of Disruption (MTPD)
data.description: Maximum time before business failure occurs

parameters.notes: HR functions can temporarily be manual
